t: Why do so many TextNow numbers already have unused Amazon accounts open on them? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 4): TextNow numbers are often used by scammers to open Amazon accounts. These scammers use the TextNow numbers to create fake accounts and then use the accounts to make fraudulent purchases or to obtain personal information from unsuspecting customers.
